name: Star Control
description:
Star Control is an action, strategy and arcade game developed by Toys for Bob. It was originally released in 1990. Accolade published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Star Control on Commodore / Amiga, Genesis and PC.
It was produced by Pam Levins. It was scored by Kyle Freeman and Tommy V. Dunbar.
